overview: Veiled by the moonâ€™s providence, on a beach, alone, a dreamer wanders the coastline. Locked in a gaze with the lucent pearl in the sky, the dreamer is at once at peace; assuaged by the embrace of the moon and the constant of the tide - a cordial lunar exchange that exists in perpetuity; unchanging and eternal.  A ghostly apparition has materialised upon the shore, and beckons the dreamer toward like a sailor to the sirens.
title: The Pearl's Harvest
